| "topk"(a,  | Returns the "k" largest elements from the input along a given axis.                        |
| /, k[,     |                                                                                            |
| axis,      |                                                                                            |
| stream])   |                                                                                            |
+------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| "trace"(a, | Return the sum along a specified diagonal in the given array.                              |
| /, offset, |                                                                                            |
| axis1,     |                                                                                            |
| axis2[,    |                                                                                            |
| dtype])    |                                                                                            |
+------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| "transpos  | Transpose the dimensions of the array.                                                     |
| e"(a, /[,  |                                                                                            |
| axes,      |                                                                                            |
| stream])   |                                                                                            |
+------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| "tri"(n,   | An array with ones at and below the given diagonal and zeros elsewhere.                    |
| m, k[,     |                                                                                            |
| dtype,     |                                                                                            |
| stream])   |                                                                                            |
+------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| "tril"(x,  | Zeros the array above the given diagonal.                                                  |
| k, *[,     |                                                                                            |
| stream])   |                                                                                            |
+------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| "triu"(x,  | Zeros the array below the given diagonal.                                                  |
| k, *[,     |                                                                                            |
| stream])   |                                                                                            |
+------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| "var"(a,   | Compute the variance(s) over the given axes.                                               |
| /[, axis,  |                                                                                            |
| keepdims,  |                                                                                            |
| ddof,      |                                                                                            |
| stream])   |                                                                                            |
+------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| "view"(a,  | View the array as a different type.                                                        |
| dtype[,    |                                                                                            |
| stream])   |                                                                                            |
+------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| "where"(c  | Select from "x" or "y" according to "condition".                                           |
| ondition,  |                                                                                            |
| x, y, /,   |                                                                                            |
| *[,        |                                                                                            |
| stream])   |                                                                                            |
+------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| "zeros"(s  | Construct an array of zeros.                                                               |
| hape[,     |                                                                                            |
| dtype,     |                                                                                            |
| stream])   |                                                                                            |
+------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| "zeros_li  | An array of zeros like the input.                                                          |
| ke"(a, /,  |                                                                                            |
| *[,        |                                                                                            |
| stream])   |                                                                                            |
+------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
